title: CNBC Cancels Shepard Smith’s Show in Move Away From General News
description: Mr. Smith joined CNBC in 2020 after leaving his longtime home on Fox News, where he was a reliably nonpartisan presence.
dc:creator: Benjamin Mullin
media:credit: Bryan Derballa for The New York Times
media:description: Shepard Smith’s last show at CNBC will be later this month.
